title: Not honouring autofill roles
body:
Every other game will involve someone being autofilled a role, support for example and they will just completely ignore this given role and lock a champion for another role. Some will ask for a swap others do not, however regardless of this they continue to get away with gaming the system and ignoring the given role. There must be repercussions for doing this, there's no way out during the pick/ban sequence if this happens and there's no direct report option available. It's a complete lack of ability to work within a team structure and for the people who do get their roles taken during autofill protection is just plain unfair.

There needs to be a report option at the very least to highlight this prevalent issue.

Either way, I pick my second best champion and try my best at the role I get (even if my Annie is garbage).
